root.name: Mr.Space!!
root.description: GameplayÂ In Mr.Space!!, the player must progress through a series of levels that increase in speed the longer that the game has been played. The player controls an unnamed stick figure(possibly also named Mr.Space!!) in a space-ace 2D environment. To survive and advance through the levels, the player must find a gap between two separating walls and hide in that gap to avoid being crushed when the walls come together to avoid losing a life and to progress.
